name: Ocean Survival 3D PRO
description:
You travel on the sea. But raft collide with rock.. And now you must survive!
Take different boxes around you - there are many items and resources!
Use simple craft system for create new instruments and blocks.
Build the biggest raft ever!
Don't dive into the water! It's very dangerous, you can drown!
See on live and food indicators on top of screen.

New survival adventure are begining now!
